long_description: The lightweight and comfortable Tune Belt armband lets you conveniently carry your Apple iPhone or other electronic device while you run or work out. Designed for the iPhone 3G and 3Gs, the Tune Belt armband also works with iPhone 4 and 4S, BlackBerry phones, HTC Hero, HTC Magic and the Palm Pre. Also compatible with T-Mobile Dash, T-Mobile myTouch 3G and T-Mobile Sidekick and many more. Lightweight neoprene material is comfortable next to skin; neoprene provides cushion for your device and protects against perspiration and scratches. Clear protective window cover allows full control of your phone while it is stowed. Armband adjusts to fit arms that measure 9 - 17 in. around; Armband Extender (not included) allows it to fit larger arm sizes. Maximum device size that will fit in the pocket is 6.5 in. in circumference and 4.5 in. long.
short_description: The lightweight and comfortable Tune Belt armband lets you conveniently carry your Apple iPhone or other electronic device while you run or work out.
